body_html: @tobegit3hub : Can you trim your code down considerably so that it focuses on this problem?Currently, there is a lot of code there that seems unrelated to the problem at hand. It would also be nice to factor out the common parts between distributed and standalone versions so its easier to see what the two share and what they do not.
